00144         inline int getNumberCell(void) const
00145         {
00146                 int cellSize = 8*sizeof(unsigned int);
00147                 int rest = length%cellSize;
00148                 if(rest > 0)
00149                         return 1+length/cellSize;
00150                 else
00151                         return length/cellSize;
00152         }
00153 
00157         void print(void) const;
00158 
00164         void print(const Level* level, const int* levelToZonePos) const;
00165 
00173         inline int readPos(const int pos) const
00174         {
00175                 int cellSize = (8*sizeof(unsigned int));
00176 
00177                 // Cell of tab where the bit is (starting with 0)
00178                 int bitCell = pos/cellSize;
00179                 // Position of the bit in tab[cell] (starting with 0)
00180                 int bitPos = pos%cellSize;
00181 
00182                 if(bitCell < getNumberCell() && bitCell >= 0)
00183                         return (this->zone[bitCell] >> (cellSize-1-bitPos)) & 1;
00184                 else
00185                 {
00186                         printf("Zone :: readPos error (pos < 0 or pos > number of bits)\n");
00187                         return -1;
00188                 }
00189         }
00190
